serverUrl.title: API URL
serverUrl.description: The API URL for fetching data from Bitbucket

username.description: Bitbucket username. Either username/password or Access Token must be provided.

token.title: Access Token
token.description: Personal Access Token for Bitbucket API authentication. See https://confluence.atlassian.com/bitbucketserver/personal-access-tokens-939515499.html for information on how to generate this token.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: List of repositories in your Bitbucket workspace

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Bitbucket in the ISO 8601 format, i.e YYYY-MM-DDTmm:HH:ssZ. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

pagelen.title: Page Size
pagelen.description: Page size to use when requesting records from Bitbucket API
